name: Save open Tabs on Firebase
description: Send your open tabs to firebase for processing

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com  https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/algoliasearch@4.22.0/dist/algoliasearch.umd.js
